column3:
Does not compute Polynomial multiplication, addition, etc correctly. 
Otherwise, a good app. Edit: Thanks for your reply. Examples of incorrect 
polynomial arithmetic: [1] (x+1) √ó (x+1) gives x^2+3x+1 (correct answer is 
x^2+2x+1) [2] (x+1) + (x+1) gives 3x+3 (correct answer is 2x+2) [3] 
Division s...Full ReviewDoes not compute Polynomial multiplication, addition, etc correctly. 
Otherwise, a good app. Edit: Thanks for your reply. Examples of incorrect 
polynomial arithmetic: [1] (x+1) √ó (x+1) gives x^2+3x+1 (correct answer is 
x^2+2x+1) [2] (x+1) + (x+1) gives 3x+3 (correct answer is 2x+2) [3] 
Division seems to be OK. (I tried one example and it was correct.) [4] The 
correct spelling is "Remainder"; not "Reminder".
So far it is the best calculator i have ever downloaded. Keep on improving it more and more.

Good. The lower parts of the output are sometimes not visible. But it's a 
great app.

Sorry, but ruining what could be a great app with full screen ads with sound blocking the ENTIRE screen just isn't going to do you any favours. After just 2 (yes TWO!) key presses?!? I understand you need to make money, but this isn't the way to do it #fail

Stepwise Solutions are provided instead of straight answers which is very helpful in understanding. The interface is user friendly and easy to understand. Very helpful for students. Big applause for the developer of this app for good work.

I'm regularly looking for a quality calculator app. Super Scientific has much functionality, including universal conststants list which can be quite helpful at times. My favorite aspect is the well designed interface with bright and clear graphical presentation. So far I've settled here. Thanks for ...Full ReviewI'm regularly looking for a quality calculator app. Super Scientific has much functionality, including universal conststants list which can be quite helpful at times.
